question: Can I refinance my mortgage with a current balance of $200,000 and an interest rate of 5%?
true_answer: Yes, refinancing is possible. New interest rate should be lower than 5% for savings.

steps.content: Can I refinance my mortgage with a current balance of $200,000 and an interest rate of 5%?
Plan: 1) Check current market interest rates using home_loan_agent. 2) Verify credit status with credit_agent. 3) Calculate potential savings using calculator. 4) Supervisor review. 5) Return answer.
Retrieving current market interest rates for refinancing.
Current market rates are around 3.5% - 4% for similar loans.
Credit score is 700, which qualifies for most refinancing options.
Potential savings calculated as $150/month with a new interest rate of 3.75%.
Are there any fees I should be aware of?
Retrieving information on typical refinancing fees.
Refinancing fees can range from 2% to 5% of the loan amount.
Review complete, all checks are validated.
Yes, refinancing is possible. New interest rate should be lower than 5% to save approximately $150/month. Fees range from 2% to 5% of loan.
Consider the break-even point to ensure savings cover the refinancing fees over time.
